genes.title: æ ¸å¿ƒç‰¹æ€§
genes.content:
- ğŸš€ **Parallel Processing**: Run 20+ Claude Code agents simultaneously (up to 50 with `max_agents` config)
- ğŸ¯ **Multiple Workflows**: Bug fixing, best practices implementation, or coordinated multi-agent development
- ğŸ¤ **Agent Coordination**: Advanced lock-based system prevents conflicts between parallel agents
- ğŸŒ **Multi-Stack Support**: 34 technology stacks including Next.js, Python, Rust, Go, Java, Angular, Flutter, C++, and more
- ğŸ“Š **Smart Monitoring**: Real-time dashboard with context warnings, heartbeat tracking, and tmux pane titles
- ğŸ”„ **Auto-Recovery**: Automatically restart
